lenders.name: Lea
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women should have the same opportunities as men in building a solid business.  Additional support is needed to make this happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large, global software company; I sell "solutions" to my customers to help them provide better services to their customers.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I've had people help me through some tough times, and I want to be able to help others in need too.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping patients in the hospital meet their dietary needs.

lenders.name: tracie
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me a loan to start up my own business and to be able to help someone else in need to improve their life-How could I not give back!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a doggie day care.  We provide playgroups, boarding and grooming.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: There is a need.

lenders.name: liz
lenders.loan_because: In my country ,I am considered 'poor' . I am self employed and partly disabled . { no gvmnt help } I have traveled to central America and seen how far my dollar can go . I am happy to help another woman working hard to make her and her family a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sew anything for boats . Tops , covers , cushions , and upholstery.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.occupational_info: A believer in dreams.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.  I especially want to see a fellow telecommunications special succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a telecommunications specialist that project manages the installation of large bandwidth around the world.

lenders.name: JUDITH
lenders.occupation: DIRECTOR OF CHILDRENS SERVICES FOR NON PROFIT

lenders.name: jacqui
lenders.loan_because: I have been looking for a worthwhile cause that I truly believed would make a difference in the hopes and dreams for somebody else.

lenders.name: Barney
lenders.loan_because: We are all one family of man.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching is very challeging and rewarding. It is one of the earliest endeavors of mankind and it changes as society changes.

lenders.name: Alan and Becky
lenders.occupational_info: Alan preserves and cares for artwork in a museum. Becky is an artist and teaches art to children.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help women who are in need.  It feels like a very small effort with a much bigger result for someone who really needs help.
lenders.occupational_info: I sold a retail clothing store and an ecommerce website.  I have been retired for over a year and spend a lot of time with my daughters (21 nd 26), my husband Alan and my doggie Joey!

lenders.name: Mick
lenders.loan_because:
"They who say that we should love our fellow citizens but not foreigners, destroy the universal brotherhood of mankind, without which benevolence and justice would perish forever."  Cicero

"Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little." Edmund Burke

lenders.name: Amelia
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent program, which allows people to work for a better way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Community development, social work, cultural competancy training, grant writing, program management and design .

lenders.name: Marlene
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for life I have, and the ability to raise my child with love,  peace, and plenty...I would like to pass along  the generosity I have received from others in the course of my life.

lenders.name: Debie
lenders.loan_because: If I had not had someone give me new chances, I don't know where I'd be right now.  God has blessed me and my family in many ways.  I hope I can help bless others ...
lenders.occupational_info: This is a picture of my son, daughter, me and my dad.  My dad and my kids are my hero's!

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed with my life and wish to share some of my good fortune, and I am inspired by the ambition and determination of others whose lives are substantially more difficult than my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell and support software developed by our own programmer.

lenders.name: deborah
lenders.occupation: Dept of Public Health Program Director
lenders.loan_because: there are no boundaries in the world anymore.  The impact of poverty on one person affects us all. The impact of OPPORTUNITY on one person also affects us all!
lenders.occupational_info: I direct an injury prevention and control program and see the effects of poverty, and opportunity, on children.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: it is my way of ministering hope.  I sense hope in the lives of these people.
lenders.occupational_info: Community Action Center Volunteer

lenders.name: Ben & Abigael
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can and it's right.
lenders.occupational_info: Abby is a Music Librarian for one of the  largest public library systems in the United States and an early music singer. I am a licensed bodyworker for an international day spa and a private instructor.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe great changes can be made one small step at a time.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I know that it takes a lot of support to make a business work, whether it be a friend, family or just someone that believes in you, makes all the difference in the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I've justed started two new businesses, one helping peope find a place they can call home and also helping people find affordable healthcare or a home based business

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Because my life is so blessed and I want to pass it on.

lenders.name: John & Deb
lenders.loan_because: We have the ability and want to help those in need.

lenders.name: Cornita
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.  Helping small businesses in their quest to succeed has a greater impact in that individuals, families and communities reap the benefits as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My job focuses on helping persons in need of assistance in handling real estate matters.

lenders.name: Davida
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I should. There was a time I could have used the help.  And now that I can help, I will.
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinate the utilization of outside companies to supplement our business needs. Both nationally and internationally.

lenders.name: Don & Sue
lenders.loan_because: Because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Architect while my wife will retire soon.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupational_info: I teach general classroom music at a public elementary school.  My students are ages 6 through 11.  In my classroom we sing, dance, play instruments and learn about cultures around the world.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: A friend of mine, Carrie Dulin taught me about giving to other people by dedicating her whole life, and ultimately her life, to KIVA's principals.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: once someone gave me a chance, and now I would like to give back.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference

lenders.name: Catherine McCaffrey
lenders.loan_because:
I can't go to them.
I want to make a difference in the lives of people who need a hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
I give to more than a dozen charities regularly - but none as satisfying as loaning my money to women I'll never see.  We (United Methodist Women) are having a book study on Half the Sky soon.  I plan to do a display of the women who have used my money.
I just studied Chang the World with a group.  I am praying that people at
our church will begin contributing to Kiva this year.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: people need to feel empowered.

lenders.name: Walt Barrett
lenders.occupation: President of China Depot / A to Z Global Marketing
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and wish to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own a very successful import-export business, www.chinadepot.com, and have also started a business building micro homes that run totally by solar and are off the power grid.
 I started my Internet business in 1995  with only a $1000.00 investment to buy a computer and get on the Internet. I plan on at least one loan a month.  I also build solar water pumping systems for underdeveloped areas.
   I am also a writer, photographer, and film maker.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to live where I do. I want to see others achieve their dreams and if I can help by participating in Kiva then why shouldn't we all. Think of the potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chef for a large Theme park resort in Florida. I oversee food operations in a luxury resort hotel. I feed tourists on vacations.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: The interest returned on this $25 is far more valuable than the % from a bank, etc.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a sales team for a leading company in IP Test.

lenders.name: Bill and Arlene
lenders.loan_because: Our motto is "everyone should have one house before someone gets two." There should be an equalizing of assets throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Bill:sourdough bread factory supervisor. Arlene: Factory helper. Each day 40,000 loaves of bread are made and distributed throughout our area in stores and farmer markets. All the bread is all natural.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a major logistics and transportation company.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are in need. Others don't have the luck or priviliges that I've had.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to 7th and 8th grade students.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in the world who are in the business world
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes

lenders.name: Carmen & John (& Trot)
lenders.loan_because: This is an incredible opportunity to help someone in a tangible way.  We're happy to be part of this process...

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and I'm so excited to be able to support people in their unique quests, rather than contribute to a faceless organization. It's a great thrill and privilege to be able to make an impact without needing large sums of donation money to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a lifelong editor and writer specializing in marketing. In my own work, I'm looking for entrepreneurial ideas that could work as businesses for poor women, especially in third world countries. I'd like to help more women and children lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: it is what the universe expects of us
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the story of the United States to 17 year old young adults

lenders.name: Jo
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give people a "leg up" so they can have a better life.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I can make a small difference
lenders.occupational_info: I am a trumpet player and recording engineer.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of P2P lending.
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology Outsourcing, Help Desk, Network Infrastructure, Systems Administration.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's a small amount of money, that can mean so much to someone else.  I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school Geometry.  That's a mathematics course that deals with shapes and angles.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: My ancestors came from eastern Europe and I have been on several medical mission trips to third world countries.  I realize how much can be done with what to us seems like a small amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 42 years. I have been at the University of WI hospital and clinics for almost 20 years.

lenders.name: audrey
lenders.loan_because: i ve been helped by others so i want to pass that help on.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupation: Graduate student/ single Mom of 2 college students
lenders.loan_because: I care and I believe in these women- I know the struggles and I know the determination they feel as they work against a society that holds them back.

lenders.name: Betsi
lenders.occupational_info: generate / review / analyze/ negotiate contracts

lenders.name: KS _Meadowlark
lenders.loan_because: It is important to educate and provide opportunities for women to earn a living to support their families and children. Educated women are the only means for people to get out of poverty.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: I like to think that participating in Kiva is a small step in helping motivated small business men and women across the world become succesful.
lenders.occupational_info: I write protocols for the treatment of cancer in our network of 600+ doctors in the community setting across the United States. Once the studies are completed, I write the presentations and publications from the study data.

lenders.name: Diane and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in life and are happy to have this chance to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Diane is a retired school teacher.
Stephen is retired from a refinery laboratory.

lenders.name: Ponda
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: According to my daughter, "Architects help people build houses so people can be happy. They can build offices so people can go to work there".

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help make a difference directly and now through KIVA I have found a way!

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to be a female business owner and have been blessed with my success, it's time to pass that on to other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of The Scented Garden in St Michaels Maryland. I admire women who have the courage to open their own businesses.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a local financial firm providing computer and software support to the associates.

lenders.name: UncleBob
lenders.loan_because: Helping Others
lenders.occupational_info: Medical

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea.  There have been times in my life when only the faith and action of others has sustained me.  I owe my planet and it's people, don't we all?

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I like to know to whom, and to where, money I donate is going and Kiva provides that.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and am going to use this as a class project for some of my students

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help others have a better life, and it was so easy to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher.  Although I loved teaching for 35 years, I now enjoy being a homemaker and full-time grandmother.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: There is a need and I can.

lenders.name: Lynn & Al
lenders.loan_because: we are able.

lenders.name: Virginia & Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: No one can do it all alone.

lenders.name: Kimberly and Alex
lenders.loan_because: I have served in a foreign country for 2 years and this is my way of giving back a little of what i learned from them.
lenders.occupational_info: I see patients and prescribe drugs to help people get well.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in offering a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: Bookkeeper for a non-profit organization.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed.  Maybe I can help someone have a better life. A hand up is much better than a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: Cross country truck driver with my husband, Patrick.

lenders.name: Tracie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an incredible way to actually  help people.  Instead of just giving with the hope of it being helpful, you actually get to see the person you're helping!  I think it makes the world a much smaller place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.  I work with children who are learning disabled.  I absolutely love my job!  It's a joy to see children learn everyday.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I understand the struggles that entrepreneurs face when trying to increase their business with limited resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell cell phones and activate service with major service providers.  I also resell mailboxes on a server to allow small businesses the opportunity to enjoy the benefits of a server without having to buy one.  Additionally, I offer after-sale support with the higher end phones (PDA and Smartphones)

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.occupational_info: Social Work manager at a clinic for HIV/AIDS.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.  These folks need more than they have.  It just makes sense!

lenders.name: Mandy and Abigail
lenders.loan_because: I feel a responsibility to help where I can.  This is a great way to have a direct impact on another person's life.  I want to share the importance of helping another human being with my daughter.  I want her to learn by example and teach her that all humans are interdependent.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to 15 and 16 year old students.  I teach writing, grammar, and world literature.

lenders.name: SHIRLEY A
lenders.loan_because: I just want to give others a chance in life to better their life and also what I am doing is what the Lord would want me to do, plus makes me feel good that I am helping .
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jack of all trades,master of none. You are my sister and brother no matter where you live, I am a follower of  Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Karl & Dana
lenders.loan_because: We believe it is important to help and recognize those who help themselves and there families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Clients reduce their Fleet costs and maximize production.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a difference- one small action at a time. We are all connected so...How could I not want to be a part of that? :)
lenders.occupational_info: I use my hands to massage and do hands on energy healing to help people who are in pain have less pain.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Providing a helping hand from another along the path of life's journey.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide instructions that make a computer perform useful tasks.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can afford it and I have the ability to take and pay back loans myself.  It allows me to improve my family's life, and I'm sure it will benefit those that I extend to as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run approximately 20 angus-maine anjou cows on a small farm in east-central Iowa.  We also work at jobs in town

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: it is a way for ordinary people to help change other people's lives in an extraordinary way.
lenders.occupational_info: This is my 35th year as a teacher. Mostly I've worked with 5th graders, and that has blessed me with many happy experiences and memories. My job is not about the paperwork that is required, but about the learning. Learning is what really matters.

lenders.name: Bette
lenders.loan_because: My life is good.  I want to help others achieve a better life through supporting their efforts.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I've been given so much. I'm fortunate I have a beautiful house, dogs and I am able to go to school and not have to work. If $25 can help some one, I can give up eating out one time a week to help someone who is stuggling to make ends meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lenders.name: kwok
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others in anyway that I can.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We plant, grow and harvest corn and soybeans.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to give other a jump start at opportunity and success. A small loan oftentimes is the difference between success and failure.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse who works at a local clinic in a rural community.

lenders.name: Christ In Motion
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help others and become a channel of God's Love

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: It's such a small thing to do, yet it can make such a huge difference in another's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach classes to college students.

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international humanitarian organization focused on helping children and communities. I was based in Asia for two years and am now based in the US again.

lenders.name: charlotte
lenders.loan_because: i saw the information on the Today Show this morning and felt compelled to help others in need
lenders.occupational_info: i make jewelry with my husband and sell it at craft shows and my online store. as someone who is an entrepreneur myself, it was important to share with others.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because:
I am grateful for the blessings in my life; the least I can do is offer a helping hand to others.

Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. - John D. Rockefeller Jr.

Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow. - Thornton Wilder from "The Matchmaker

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankfut that I have 5 healthy children and I'm able to stay home to care for them.

lenders.name: Dick
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives
lenders.occupational_info: I sell bolting tools used in heavy equipment and industry.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I feel connected and responsible to the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Physical Therapist to treat all kinds of patients, and help them do the things they used to do before their injury or sickness.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference and teach my children to lend a hand to someone who may not have the opportunities that we do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer for a government agency.

lenders.name: Crystal & Tim
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I know what it is to start own business and how important a loan can be to make a business work.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a Cell phone Retailer for Sprint and Nextel. We sell and repair sprint and Nextel Cellular Phones

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I have a strong regard for those who support themselves and family through entrepreneurial business enterprises.  This also gives me an opportunity to offer assistance on a more personal level to people in areas of the world I've yet to visit.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee a business that provides medical care for animals.

lenders.name: Butch
lenders.occupation: Web Design / Wearer of many hats
lenders.loan_because:
It just seems like a great idea!
A small low-risk investment, that can help so much.
I have been a small business owner, so I can understand how a small loan can help a lot.
It feels great to help make a differance.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites, and I do many other things, mostly with computers.

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: I can relate to someone running their own business and needing help to grow that business.
lenders.occupational_info: I had an idea and created a product which I sell wholesale to stores across the US and Canada.

lenders.name: 'neta
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my mom who wanted to help folks striving in hard times, and my dad who let not the left hand knoweth.  Personal blessings inspire me in hope  that a loan may be a blessing for another.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a  business consulting practice and  teach business management classes at the university level.

lenders.name: Kelley
lenders.loan_because: I had my own business for a while, and it was very difficult getting started. I want to help empower women so they can sustain themselves and thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse at a University and I'm studying to be a Nurse Practitioner.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I microscopically screen for cancer, primarily for cervical cancer (pap smears0.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I like to know that I can help someone else fulfill their dreams in a practical way.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I admire people to try to succeed in their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired Special Education Teacher.  Now I have a home based business as a Creative Memories Consultant.  I help people preserve their photos & stories in beautiful albums.

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I enjoy helping people better their lives.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: ...because it is all good.  God provides for us so we can provide for others. I recently lost my job but want to support others however I can.

lenders.name: Scott & Jean
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because:
I love to "PAY IT FORWARD". It's a great opportunity to help someone else.
I have been greatly blessed by those around me, and I wish to offer help to others who need that extra helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own a small business designing and making  handmade jewelry.
Something I love to do, and have a great passion for.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way for people such as myself who are unable to make large donations to make a difference for many people and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist  our client employers with their employee benefits, such as health insurance.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: It takes all of us to make a difference!!

lenders.name: Troy & Kelli Van Houten
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in the United States.  It's clearly the right thing to do - helping those who do not have financial resources like we do.
lenders.occupational_info: The Company I work for (Micron Technology) manufactures computer chips that fuel the most advanced digital products - revolutionizing the way your applications capture, move, and store information.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: small business owners everywhere face a multitude of challenges and this is a way I can help answer one of them.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the books for my husband's businesses.

lenders.name: Rex & Dianne
lenders.loan_because: We should always be willing to help others

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are helping themselves rather than just always handing out money.  It gives one a sense of pride to know they are earning their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: when someone sees the doctor, the doctor make notes for the patient's medical record.  I listen to the doctor's recorded notes and type them up for the medical record.

lenders.name: Summer
lenders.occupation: Mother of two, and Technical Records Specialist

lenders.name: Audree
lenders.loan_because:
1.  Impact - One can impact another's life in a profound way.
2.  Global - One can reach across boarders
3.  Variety - Great to see the variety of opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I help build buildings by writing contracts, watching budgets, and supporting the people in the field that get all dirty and sweaty.

lenders.name: Cindy

lenders.occupational_info: I used to sit at a desk all day, in front of a computer, and solve problems.  I quit that after 30+ years. Now I do alterations/mending.  I spend a lot of my free  time reading, painting and keeping up with politics.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in my business and I want to help others to be successful as well....

lenders.occupational_info: I use to work for a bank but now I am enjoying life and my grandchildren.

lenders.loan_because: people have been good to me.  I am very blessed and thankful.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fourth and fifth grade language arts and social studies

lenders.occupational_info: retired.  like to garden flowers - mainly day lilies.

Ginger -- I'm a minister in the United Church of Christ

Milton -- I'm a teacher in a small high school

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: If you can be a blessing to someone in need, why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I think it is good to help others to help themselves.

lenders.name: rachell
lenders.loan_because: LIVING IS GIVING!!  IN EVERYONE HEART IS THE WORD OF CARE!
lenders.occupational_info:
AUTOMOBILE INDUSTRAY

We build Nissan automobiles.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help women in other countries who are trying to make it on their own in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office handling bills that need to be paid, preparing letters for my employer, answering the telephone, preparing & handling bank deposits, and in general, doing anything that needs to be done in an office.

lenders.name: richik
lenders.occupational_info: i have a small system integration company of my own.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact.
lenders.occupational_info: In 2005, I decided to become an entrepreneur so I could spend more time with my family. My Business provides information and services to the Payments Industry.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do. Living in the US with as many luxuries as we have, I think it is our responsibility to help others. The amount of these loans is so small and yet they can change lives. I think about how much money is spent eating out or going to movies and such and if that activity can be skipped a few times, the money can to these loans and it really doesn't present any hardship to me in any way.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and in-home pet sitting business. My customers are generally well off and my service is a luxury.

lenders.name: CMD
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can!

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can and it makes a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I import and distribute handmade greeting cards from South Africa and give the proceeds to our 501(c)3 which helps to educate young girls in Namibia.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: No matter  where you lay your head at the end of the day, no matter what God you might pray to, we are all brothers and sisters.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct an employment program that helps people with disabilities and other difficulties find work.

lenders.name: Ann & Sandi
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives us access to those in need and it gives individuals an opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Joy-Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.  It is a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a director of school programs for children with disabilities.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I believe God works many miracles, large and small, and it is our responsibility to help when we can.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I really want to help others and have the world work better.

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: As others have helped me along the way, I want to help boost others to have a better lives.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who work to help themselves, those who are not looking for a handout.

lenders.name: KAREN
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed just to be living in America with all the freedoms and opportunities we enjoy.  Kiva provides a mechanism for helping improve the lives of others around the world.  Thanks, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the Federal government after 40 years.  I was a Contracting Officer and purchased goods and services for my Federal agency.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: There is no separation, we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites on the Internet and use them to make money in various ways.

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me.  It's time to pass it along.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is similar to a city manager; I operate a Tribal government and Native American Indian Reservation.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I had nothing to do with where I was born and how fortunate I am because of that. I can, however, have something to do with easing the struggles of others who were born into less fortunate circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others to understand products and materials that are more sustainable to use in their homes, which is not only healthier for them, but the environment as well.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person. ~ Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Liz and Deb
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: bonnie
lenders.loan_because: So much has been given to me.  Kiva gives me the opportunity to make a difference for one person.    "All I can do is add my light to the sum of light."
lenders.occupational_info: my days are spent at the intersection of medical device design, people, and technology.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal problems.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: Kiva helps me make a difference in my own small way.  Person to person giving makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 34 years before retiring.

lenders.name: RUBY
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I train people to become teachers to young children. In other words, I work in an Educational Program.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
You can't beat the drum of what's going wrong and let in what is right! 
                                          - Abraham-Hicks
lenders.occupational_info: As a human being, I am learning from teachers and in turn, teaching others about caring for and supporting individuals in the world that have had less opportunities than myself.  I believe it takes all of us as human beings, working together in support of real causes with open hearts and love for those seeking to better themselves.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a cow!!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent battered women and children with the goal of empowerment and self-sufficiency for abused families.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Frankly because it is so easy and I think these loans help individuals.  I should be physically out there building homes with Habitat but can't seem to make the time or effort.  This charity assuages my guilt.  I will lend more and urge my business associates to do the same.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Freely I have received; now it's time to freely give.
lenders.occupational_info: I remind people that Jesus especially cared for the least, the last, and the lost.  I believe we are called do the same today.

lenders.name: Rusyl Lynn
lenders.loan_because: at some point in our life, we will need a helping hand; and by helping one another, we establish a little more sense of well-being.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I was born and I live in the U.S.A., we have so many advantages here that I feel I must help those who have had a harder life.

lenders.name: Linae
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely blessed to have been loaned money to obtain an education to have my career. I feel it's important to support one another. This is a wonderful opportunity to give to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to keep their teeth healthy.

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is like to start over, need help, and not know how to get it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach sixth grade students at a public school in Arizona.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: It's one way I can give back for all the help I have received over the years. I am loaning to Yuliya because my own family is from Ukraine.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a teacher.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people
lenders.occupational_info: I love to troubleshoot electro/mechanical problems

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy philanthropy and travel. I am interested in helping people who are honest and hardworking, but were not born in a country of such great opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell real estate in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho - a picturesque town with an abundance of lakes, rivers, mountains and kind and friendly people.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of helping people make their dreams come to fruition.

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: Makes me smile and feels so good.
lenders.occupational_info: A lifetime of "playing" with all things old and interesting.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
I have traveled and worked in other countries. I also speak French fluently. 
Kiva is an excellent program.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide renewable energy products and services.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed, and I would like to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Sharon & Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and I feel I should help people less fortunate that they may have a better life.

lenders.name: Mari
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom of three, who works hard to make ends meet, I guess you could say, "I totally understand these women and men trying to make ends meet in their end of the world"...We're all tied together in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in charge of purchasing school supplies and materials for the 9600 students in my school district (pencils, pens, paper, books, equipment, computers etc)

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: $25 is such a small amount and can do so much good. I waste that amount every week on nothing.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in a career that was based on helping people help themselves. The Kiva concept continues that.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: It funds a hard working individual who may not have the same resources as I do in my country and I feel that my help can really make a impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work early in the morning at a business  that answers calls for people who need help with their vehicle and send people to help them. I do this so I can pickup my daughter after school on time.

lenders.name: Amy and Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's good karma.  It makes us feel good to help fellow entrepreneurs make it in their business.
lenders.occupational_info: Crazy entertainment such as clowning, mime, face painting, balloon sculpting, bellydance, drumming, fire eating, fortune telling, singing telegrams, henna art, living statues, etc.

lenders.name: Aunnie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance and other social businesses to change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help social enterprises raise capital to scale their businesses and impact more people at the base of the pyramid.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: It's one way I can help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families buy and sell their homes.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: As a former single Parent times were tough for me. But God Blessed me! I like giving to someone that does not have the opportunity to get help as easy as I did as an American. I also feel like these people love there country and I want them to thrive in there villages and as they do they will also help there own economy.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I still sacrifice everyday so I can stay home and help raise my Grandchildren while there Parents work to better there lives.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I know what a helping hand can do to change the life of generations. I believe that when given the tools, people will thrive with dignity, self respect and pride.  We all deserve this much.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a portrait art photographer specializing in newborns, pregnancy, families and intimates.  I am inspired to portray the strength of woman in different stages of life in non-traditional portrait art.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Live simply so that others may simply live.
lenders.occupational_info: teacher

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I believe in opening opportunities to others this is one way to assist those striving to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired school teacher, but continue volunteer  work with troubled youth in Utah. I like travelling, reading, quiltting,  cooking and playing the piano.

lenders.name: KAY
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune and as a business owner, I know how far a dollar can go in a startup.

lenders.name: Zack
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Manufacture natural herbal supplements.

lenders.name: Rosemarie
lenders.loan_because: I care and micro finance is wonderful!

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.loan_because: It's neat to help on individual basis, and for only $25 how can you not help out?

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to see Happy Faces
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Investor in Venture that are of my Own and Others.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of supporting people whose success brings a better life to their families and to others in their local community.  When you are blessed to live in a country with abundant opportunity, it feels good to connect your own resources with individuals all over the world that have their own hopes and dreams for which they are willing to work hard to achieve.  Kiva empowers indiviuals to help individuals in a new and powerful way.
lenders.occupational_info: My work has generally focused around designing instructional or educational materials, but it is also about improving communications in general.  These days I am involved more in freelance writing, and I am semi-retired.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I became involved because I've lived a blessed life with very few hurdles or obstacles to overcome and wish to make life easier for someone less fortunate.  It's my way of thanking the universe and sharing my modest pot of gold with a person who is trying to make a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from teaching after 30 years and now exploring a career as a photographer.

lenders.name: Franki
lenders.loan_because: It's all about helping people help themselves. These folks don't want or need a handout. They need a chance. I've been given many chances by many different people who believed in me. Who doesn't deserve that?
lenders.occupational_info: As a hospice nurse I take care of terminally ill people, allowing them to die at home with dignity surounded by family and friends.

lenders.name: NANCY
lenders.loan_because:
I like helping people help themselves. Loaning through KIVA is a great investment and pleasure.
GIVING TO KIVA IS ADDICTIVE !!!!\

Check out www.Kivashoppingclub.com
lenders.occupational_info:
I taught children who were 12-17 years old,but had the mental age of a 2 to 6 year old.
I work with foreign students,their wives and children and love it.
I am also traveling several times a year.
I would like to hear from you Kiva people must be nice.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: It 's fun to help other succeed !  It also makes me proud.

lenders.name: Arlen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves

lenders.name: Butch & Dawg
lenders.loan_because: It helps us put life in perspective. We are so lucky to have the opportunities and the lifestyle we enjoy everyday,  when you see how little it takes to change someone's life, you never take what you have for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: raising capital from institutions (banks, insurance companies, pension funds) for our asset backed lending strategy.

lenders.name: Dennis & Peggy
lenders.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for that we just want to help others to attain their goals.

lenders.name: Demi
lenders.loan_because: These are the kind of people I want to help;  those who are trying to improve their lives by doing it themselves, and not expecting others to do it for them.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I believe my generation can end extreme poverty. This is one way to start.

lenders.name: Mary & Ed
lenders.loan_because: We are very blessed and would like to help others in a more direct way.
lenders.occupational_info: We both used to work in the financial industry.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day. Teach a man to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime"~Confucius

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can loan just $25 and change another person's life - what could be better?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit horse racing association, we support horse owners & trainers in their times of need- The National HBPA.

lenders.name: marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This seems to be a way that I can make a possitive difference in the world by helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught kindergarten for 30 years.  I am a mother of three grown children and a grandmother of six.  My husband and I just celebrated 48 years of marriage.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I have AIDS and I want to give back the love and support that has been given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I regulate insurance companies for the State of  Washington.

lenders.name: Brent Connie
lenders.occupation: Contract oilfield worker & they raise sheep.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I heared about this on the Today Show. I knew that I wanted to donate, because I know how it is to live and raise kids as a single mom. There were times I didn't know how I was going to feed my kids. There was always a helping hand somewhere so this is one of my ways of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 52 years young women. I work as a papaeducator with handicap students of high school age. Been doing this for 7 years, working on my AA and then my BA.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the value of hard work and I'm happy to be able to help someone make a better life for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Diem
lenders.loan_because: I want to help whenever, I can.

lenders.name: Muriel
lenders.loan_because: It gives me more than I could ever give away.

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: It's something I can do to help a person in need and actually see the result.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to make a difference in peoples' lives.  I want to help women all over the world, and this is one way to do that.  I'm not religious in any way, just a human helping other humans.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get set up to pay bills online, and to send money over the internet.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: Initially I chose to focus on people living in the Ukraine because my grandmother, Anna Garbicz, was born there and I've always thought of Ukrainians as family. In truth, we are all ONE people and ONE family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a educator working for a non-profit to provide free CPR and First Aid classes to members of my community. I'm finishing prerequisites to attend veterinary college next year.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: "to whomever much is given, of him will much be required"
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure the quality of my company's computer software and Web sites.

lenders.name: Marty and Glade
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Marty sells RV Caravan trips and Glade is an archaeologist. They both farm part time in Colorado.

lenders.name: El Brazil
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children how to be giving and selfless individuals.  I also loan because everyone should have the opportunity to fulfill their dreams; money should not be a hinderance.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Social Studies, and English to children in the United States.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to watch a business grow and know that I had a part in helping .
lenders.occupational_info: I am now writing a book!  Love  retirement. Retired teacher.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university professor  who has been fortunate to visit many of the places affiliated with Kiva. Sharing opportunities with hard-working, energetic people allows me to  be a part of the day-to-day life of the places I've been.

lenders.name: Ann and friends
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people changing their lives for the better and becoming self sufficient.  Everyone that wants to have a chance to improve their lives should have the opportunity.  God bless these entrepenuers!

lenders.name: Magen & Nick
lenders.loan_because: We believe that through helping others we can make all our lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: Magen works in local government in the building permit department managing the computer systems.  Nick is a superintedent in commerical construction.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in equal opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant in a large telecommunications company that operates all over the world. 690 cities 60 countries and 6 continents.

lenders.name: Tony W
lenders.loan_because: Because i feel the need to help the other, beacuse there are many people who have the ideas to keep on forward but whit out money they cant become reality they dreams, having a decent life
lenders.occupational_info: Well everybody knows that whit out sacrifice we won obtain what we desire...

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like the option of loaning money to others who are just wanting some help to be successful in their work and support their family.  With some charitable donations you are temporarily rendering aid to a person but they aren't making necessary life changes to move forward in their life and become self supporting.  Kiva also provides a great opportunity to help empower woman in other parts of the world that may not necessarily have the opportunity otherwise.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: It's a small thing that I can do. And I get a kick out of how I can be a part of the lives of individuals all over the world.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: My life is filled with blessings everyday. I would like to share those blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired home economics teacher.

lenders.name: Morky
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make someone's life a little easier.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It's a small investment for me, but it will make a big difference in improving someone's life.  How could I not do it?
lenders.occupational_info: I work with artists and administrators to help facilitate the creation of meaningful performances.  I hope that the work I do makes a difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: This site offers an amazing opportunity to help people across the world invest in themselves and improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Jamie & Tonua
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
